member.name: M:Aigamo.Extensions.Primitives.BitExtensions.LowByte(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Retrieves the low-order byte from the given 16-bit value.
member.param: The value to be converted.
member.returns: The return value is the low-order byte of the specified value.

member.name: M:Aigamo.Extensions.Primitives.BitExtensions.WithLowByte(System.UInt16,System.Byte)
member.summary: Joins two byte values and creates a 16-bit unsigned integer value.
member.param: The higher part value to be joined.
The lower part value to be joined.
member.returns: return value is a 16-bit unsigned integer value.
